lead_paragraph: Nicaragua granted asylum to Mr. Funes, who has been under investigation by the Salvadoran authorities for suspicion of corruption.

byline.contributor: Gene Palumbo contributed reporting from San Salvador.

headline.print_headline: Nicaragua Grants Asylum to Ex-Leader of El Salvador
headline.main: Mauricio Funes, Ex-Leader of El Salvador Under Inquiry, Gains Asylum

snippet: Nicaragua granted asylum to Mr. Funes, who has been under investigation by the Salvadoran authorities for suspicion of corruption....
abstract: Nicaraguan government grants asylum to Mauricio Funes, former president of El Salvador under investigation for corruption; Funes says he is victim of his country's extreme right, but many analysts feel his move undermines El Salvador's effort to rein in corruption.
